Title: Relates to properties contaminated by the production, distribution or storage of the narcotic drug methamphetamine
Summary: Relates to properties contaminated by the production, distribution or storage of the narcotic drug methamphetamine.
LawCode: Add Art 14-A §§468 - 468-b, RP L; add Art 13 Title 10-A §§1378 - 1378-b, Pub Health L; amd §220.00, Pen L; amd §221-d, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, the public health law, the penal law and the executive law, in relation to properties contaminated by the production, distribution or storage of the narcotic drug methamphetamine
